results.content: I would like to take advantage of AI capabilities from both platfroms- Ibm watson and Aws. Now i personally feel that using amazon lex for developing chatbot is right decision, while we can do advanced text processing with Watson.
results.content_html: I would like to take advantage of AI capabilities from both platfroms- Ibm watson and Aws. Now i personally feel that using amazon lex for developing chatbot is right decision, while we can do advanced text processing with Watson.

results.content:
Unique course, where we could learn with side-by side comparison of two different cloud platforms- IBM Bluemix, and Amazon Web services.

When it comes to decide which vendor to choose, i found it quite helpful, as i was working on AWS, but got to learn power of IBM watson so i am in a better position to decide which service to use like TTS, STT, conversation, etc.
results.content_html:
Unique course, where we could learn with side-by side comparison of two different cloud platforms- IBM Bluemix, and Amazon Web services.

When it comes to decide which vendor to choose, i found it quite helpful, as i was working on AWS, but got to learn power of IBM watson so i am in a better position to decide which service to use like TTS, STT, conversation, etc.

results.content: useful course with a practical approach on cloud with comparative analysis of machine learning on both platforms- IBM and Amazon cloud
results.content_html: useful course with a practical approach on cloud with comparative analysis of machine learning on both platforms- IBM and Amazon cloud

results.content:
It is a good overview of Amazon and IBM tools. 

The instructor sometimes gives some examples of usage, but he is not creative, he just follows the documentation of the service he is presenting.

The course could have a better video edition because the instructor frequently keeps waiting for the service to be completed and it takes a lot.

It helped me to know what services I can use for my business, but it didn't teach me to effectively use them.

Average course
